SENTENCE.STRING: (Urdu: اسلام آباد, abode of Islam), is the capital city of Pakistan, and
is located in the Potohar Plateau in the northwest of the country.

is located within the Islamabad Capital Territory, though the area has historically been a part of the crossroads of the Punjab region and the North-West Frontier Province (the Margalla pass being a historic gateway to the North-West Frontier Province, and the Potwar Plateau historically a part of the Punjab).
